thread.title_full: Perrie Edwards in bed with Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain | Daily Mail Online

author: Becky Freeth For Mailonline
title: Perrie Edwards in bed with Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Simulating a winter wonderland for the two of them, Perrie uses a filter to make herself a bunny rabbit while fake snow falls in the frame. In another, she gives the premier league player the same photo treatment, with whiskers, a button nose and fluffy ears. That'll do wonders for the street cred: Alex is later seen with bunny ears, using one of the Snapchat filters Sweet: Adorned with white bunny ears, the playful star was serenaded with song from Oliver It's a snapshot that will no doubt earn him plenty of street cred in the locker room, ahead of Arsenal's big game against Sutton on Monday night. Alex will play away at Borough Sports Ground, while Perrie and her girlband are due back on tour with Ariana Grande in New York, later this week. The musician and her new boyfriend went public with their romance just ahead of Valentine's Day this year. She posted a picture in front of the Eiffel Tower during a romantic French holiday and captioned it simply, 'Him'. Look of love: With big, bunny ears, the blonde looked at her boyfriend with complete adoration Singing star: While Perrie should be the one known for her singing skills, it was Alex who was singing this time Cutie: The Little Mix singer is clearly quite taken with her boyfriend Perrie's latest string of videos even saw her completely merge her features with Alex's with a sweet line using their initials saying: 'AxP' The duo are thought to have been dating since last November, but they are reportedly keen to avoid being defined by their romance. Aside from her stream of hits from X Factor-formed girlband Little Mix, Perrie is still best known across the pond for her engagement to ex-One Direction star Zayn Malik. He called off the engagement in August 2015, almost four years after they were first linked, and is now dating US supermodel Gigi Hadid. Official: The duo went public with their romance two weeks ago, with this sweet kissing picture from Paris Face swap: A playful Perrie then managed to completely swap her features for Alex's Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
